meta.title: FleetKeeper - Never Miss a Deadline | Fleet Expiration Management App
meta.description: FleetKeeper helps transportation companies track vehicle inspections, driver licenses, insurance renewals, and 100+ expiration types. Get smart notifications before deadlines. Free for small fleets.

features.title: Everything You Need to
features.description: FleetKeeper provides comprehensive tools to manage all your fleet's expiration dates in one place.

tracking.title: Expiration Tracking

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.description: Get push and email alerts at customizable intervals: 60, 30, 14, 7, 3, and 1 day before expiration.

vehicles.description: Complete vehicle registry with technical specs, photos, and all linked expiration terms in one view.

drivers.description: Track driver licenses, CPC cards, ADR certifications, medical exams, and professional qualifications.

documents.description: Attach photos and scans of certificates, licenses, and documents directly to expiration terms.

roles.title: Role-Based Access
roles.description: Admin, Manager, and Driver roles with appropriate permissions. Keep your data secure and organized.

expirationTypes.description: From vehicle inspections to driver certifications, FleetKeeper covers all your compliance needs.

items.text: FleetKeeper saved us from a €500 fine last month. We would have missed our ITP deadline without the notification.
items.author: Mihai C.

items.text: Finally, all our expiration dates in one place. The mobile app is so easy to use, even our older drivers love it.
items.author: Anna S.

items.text: The notification system is exactly what we needed. Push notifications and emails make sure nothing slips through.
items.author: Piotr K.

items.question: What is FleetKeeper?
items.answer: FleetKeeper is a mobile app designed for transportation companies to track and manage expiration dates for vehicles, drivers, and company documents. It sends smart notifications before deadlines to help you stay compliant and avoid fines.

items.question: Is FleetKeeper really free?
items.answer: Yes! Our Starter plan is completely free for small fleets with up to 5 vehicles and 3 users. You get access to all expiration types and push notifications. No credit card required.

items.question: What types of expirations can I track?
items.answer: FleetKeeper supports 100+ expiration types including vehicle inspections (ITP), insurance (RCA, CASCO), tachograph calibrations, driver licenses, CPC cards, ADR certificates, medical exams, company permits, and many more.

items.question: How do notifications work?
items.answer: FleetKeeper sends push notifications and emails at configurable intervals: 60, 30, 14, 7, 3, and 1 day before expiration, plus reminders for overdue items. You can customize which notifications you receive and when.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and multi-tenant architecture to ensure your data is isolated and protected. We're fully GDPR compliant and never share your data with third parties.

items.question: Can I use FleetKeeper in my language?
items.answer: Yes! FleetKeeper supports 12 languages: English, Romanian, Hungarian, Polish, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Bulgarian, and Czech. More languages coming soon.

items.question: Can I add my team members?
items.answer: Yes! FleetKeeper supports multiple user roles: Admin (full access), Manager (manage vehicles, drivers, terms), and Driver (view-only for their own data). Invite team members directly from the app.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees. Your data remains accessible until the end of your billing period.

cta.title: Ready to Never Miss a Deadline?
cta.description: Join thousands of fleet managers who trust FleetKeeper to keep their operations compliant.
cta.note: Free for fleets up to 5 vehicles. No credit card required.
